metadata.title: LAXMI | Luxury Italian Furniture Consulting Made in Italy
metadata.description: Exclusive luxury Italian furniture consulting. LAXMI guides discerning connoisseurs in selecting Made in Italy pieces: artisanal quality, unique design, timeless elegance. Milan.
metadata.keywords: luxury furniture, Italian furniture, furniture consulting Milan, luxury interior design, Made in Italy, designer furniture, exclusive furniture, consulenza arredamento, luxury furniture Italy
metadata.ogTitle: LAXMI — Luxury Italian Furniture Consulting Made in Italy
metadata.ogDescription: Exclusive experience in selecting high-end Italian furniture. Professionalism, quality, authenticity.
metadata.consultingDescription: Personalized online consulting for luxury Italian furniture. Expert guidance on furniture selection, interior styling, and complete home design. Milan, Italy.
metadata.collectionsDescription: Explore our curated collections of premium Italian kitchens and furniture. Artisanal craftsmanship, exclusive designs, and timeless elegance Made in Italy.
metadata.aboutTitle: About LAXMI — Our Story & Italian Design Philosophy
metadata.aboutDescription: Discover LAXMI's passion for Italian design excellence. Named after the goddess of beauty and prosperity, we bring luxury, light, and artisanal quality to your home.
metadata.contactTitle: Contact LAXMI — Luxury Furniture Consultation in Milan
metadata.contactDescription: Get in touch with LAXMI for exclusive luxury furniture consulting. Schedule your appointment in Milan, Italy. We respond within 24–48 hours.

booking.title: Request a Consultation
booking.subtitle: By Appointment Only
booking.description: Share your vision with us and our concierge will personally reach out to arrange your exclusive consultation.

form.name: Full Name
form.messagePlaceholder: Describe your vision, preferred style, space requirements...

request.title: Request
request.description: Submit your consultation request with project details

connect.title: Connect
connect.description: Our concierge reaches out within 24-48 hours

consult.title: Consult
consult.description: Personalized meeting to understand your vision

curate.title: Curate
curate.description: We curate a bespoke proposal of exclusive pieces

collections.heroDescription: Each kitchen tells a story of artisanal passion, premium materials, and timeless design. Discover creations that transform space into a work of art.
collections.noResults: No pieces found in this category
collections.story1Text: For generations, Italian master craftsmen have perfected the art of working with wood and premium materials. Each ARREXLAB kitchen is born from the fusion of centuries-old techniques with the most advanced production technologies, creating unique pieces that stand the test of time.
collections.story1Quote: True luxury isn't seen, it's lived.
collections.story2Text: Woods selected from certified European forests, Italian marbles from the most renowned quarries, food-grade stainless steels, and latest-generation Supermatt finishes. Each material is chosen not only for its beauty but for its durability and sustainability.
collections.story3Text: No two kitchens are alike because no two families are alike. Our designers work with you to create a space that reflects your lifestyle, your culinary passions, and your aesthetic vision. From the first sketch to final installation, every detail is crafted with precision.

consulting.heroDescription: Every great space begins with a story. Yours. We transform your aspirations into environments that speak of who you are, where every detail is a statement of style and every choice reflects your uniqueness.
consulting.heroQuote: We don't furnish homes. We create stages for extraordinary lives.
consulting.philosophyText: We believe your home should be the most authentic reflection of who you are. Not a catalog of trends, but a sanctuary built around your essence. A place where every morning you wake surrounded by the beauty you chose, and every evening you return to a space that deeply belongs to you.

questionnaire.title: Discovery
questionnaire.description: A detailed questionnaire to understand your lifestyle, habits, and dreams. Because every project begins with listening.

materials.title: Documentation
materials.description: Photos and measurements of your spaces. Every corner tells a possibility, every dimension hides potential.

consultation.title: The Meeting
consultation.description: A dedicated video call where your vision meets our expertise. A dialogue, not a monologue.

creation.title: Creation
creation.description: We develop your project with layouts, moodboards, and furniture proposals curated with obsessive attention to detail.

refinement.title: Perfection
refinement.description: Revisions until every element resonates with your approval. Perfection is not rushed.

consulting.servicesSubtitle: Choose the Experience Your Space Deserves

express.name: Express Consultation
express.description: An intensive session for those seeking direction. Perfect for validating ideas, resolving doubts, and receiving targeted advice that will illuminate the path forward.
express.ideal: Ideal for those beginning the journey

singleRoom.name: Single Room
singleRoom.description: The complete transformation of one space. Every detail studied, every element carefully chosen. The result? A room that becomes your personal sanctuary.

fullHouse.name: Complete Home
fullHouse.description: The ultimate experience. Every room in your home reimagined as part of a coherent narrative. Not separate rooms, but chapters of a single story: yours.
fullHouse.ideal: Ideal for those who don't compromise

consulting.promiseText: We will never deliver a project we wouldn't be proud to sign. Your space will carry our invisible signature: that obsession with details, that pursuit of perfection, that refusal to compromise that defines everything we do.
consulting.ctaText: The first step toward the home you've always imagined is a simple conversation. Contact us to discover which experience is perfect for you.

contactPage.label: Let's Talk
contactPage.heroSubtitle: We're here to transform your vision into reality
contactPage.infoDescription: Every great project begins with a simple conversation. Whether you have a clear vision or are seeking inspiration, we're here to guide you on your journey to excellence.
contactPage.privacyConsent: I have read and accept the {link} and consent to the processing of my personal data to respond to my request. *
contactPage.mapDescription: The world's design capital, where tradition and innovation meet to create excellence.

blog.metaTitle: Blog | Luxury Interior Design Guide | LAXMI
blog.metaDescription: Discover exclusive insights on luxury interior design, Italian craftsmanship, color palettes, and premium materials. The definitive guide for refined interiors.
blog.heroSubtitle: Where design excellence meets timeless wisdom
blog.heroDescription: Explore our curated collection of expert guides, design trends, and insights into luxury Italian craftsmanship.
blog.newsletterDescription: Subscribe to receive exclusive design insights, curated trends, and invitations to private events.
blog.ctaDescription: Let our experts guide you in creating the space of your dreams.

aboutPage.label: Our Story
aboutPage.heroSubtitle: Where passion for Italian design meets artisanal excellence

nameSection.label: The Name
nameSection.title: The Meaning of LAXMI
nameSection.paragraph1: LAXMI is named after the Hindu goddess of wealth, fortune, prosperity, beauty, and light. This name embodies our mission: to bring prosperity and beauty into the spaces where people live.
nameSection.paragraph2: Just as the goddess illuminates the lives of those who honor her, we aspire to illuminate our clients' homes with refined design, premium materials, and meticulous attention to detail.

quality.title: Quality
quality.description: Only premium materials and exceptional craftsmanship to create pieces that stand the test of time.

authenticity.title: Authenticity
authenticity.description: Every piece tells a story of Italian tradition, passion, and artisanal mastery.

uniqueness.title: Uniqueness
uniqueness.description: Personalized solutions that reflect your personality and unique lifestyle.

professionalism.title: Professionalism
professionalism.description: Impeccable service from the first consultation to the final installation.

madeInItaly.title: Proudly Made in Italy
madeInItaly.description: Italy is synonymous with excellence in design and craftsmanship. Every piece we select carries centuries of tradition, innovation, and that unmistakable passion that only Made in Italy can offer.

aboutPage.ctaDescription: Discover how we can transform your spaces into a reflection of your personality and style.
